pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 26, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 26, 2016:

Kananaskis, Alberta

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Delta Lodge at Kananaskis
Kananaskis, Alberta

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media

Regina, Saskatchewan

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the File Hills Qu’Appelle Tribal Council.

Treaty Four Governance Building
740 Sioux Avenue
Fort Qu’Appelle, Saskatchewan

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity only

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.         

Treaty Four Governance Building
740 Sioux Avenue
Fort Qu’Appelle, Saskatchewan

Note for media:

• Open media coverage

Please note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
